duties_responsibilities.duty: Greeting and serving customers at the cash wrap with friendly and efficient interactions.
Maintaining accurate cash wrap organization and cleanliness, and suggesting add-ons and gift cards.
Receiving shipments and transfers, notifying management, and processing them according to company standards.
Analyzing sales floor for replenishment needs, replenishing sales floor, and executing visual merchandising needs.
Regularly participating in store physical inventory counts and maintaining company loss prevention standards.
Representing the Coach brand appropriately and creating lasting impressions on customers.
